Title: Shadow of the Thin Man
Writer: Irving Brecher (screen play), Harry Kurnitz (screen play), Harry Kurnitz (from a story by), Dashiell Hammett (based upon characters created by)
Actors: William Powell, Myrna Loy, Barry Nelson, Donna Reed
Plot: Nick and Nora are at their wisecracking best as they investigate murder and racketeering at a local race track.
